Desc.eng: It's good to see you, hunter! One of our resistance fighters found a primitive Inkhopping Modulator in an abandoned warehouse. We thought that it might interest you.
And what does this device do?

I used to serve in the expeditionary forces. The scientists sent us into the Ink with these machines. Do you see the three switches? Each switch marks a destination. Sadly you can’t really read the labels.
It’s simply too dangerous. I don’t want to end up in an unknown pocket of the Ink.
Can I choose? Can I…? Oh, well.
This one says something about “flickering lights”. Let’s try this.
What about the one marked with “lost and found”?
